国内方面；（战时的）后方民众；后方战线

bilingual.source: The bed is in front of the desk.
The rug is in front of the beds.
Go to the front of the classroom.
See the dog in front of me?

list.abstract: front（英[frʌnt]，美[frʌnt]），英语单词，作名词用，为前部；前面；正面。作形容词用，为前部的；前面的；在前面的。作动词用，为面向；给…装正面；到达。短语搭配有in front of（在…前面），例句为“Design was not only about the front page.（设计不仅仅是关于首页。）” front名词类近义词有frente、facade，及物动词类近义词有meet、confront，不及物动词类近义词有give upon、look out upon，形容词类近义词有anterior、full-face，副词类近义词有forth、to、ahead等，相关反义词有rear、back。

yingyinNormal.en: Can I sit at the front too? And me, me. Oh, I'm sorry children. You can't all sit at the front. Oh.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我也可以坐到前面去吗？我也要。对不起啦，孩子们，你们不可以一起和我都坐在前面。

yingyinNormal.en: Madam Gazelle. I feel a bit sick, can I go to the front, please? Ok, Pedro, you can go to the front of the train.
yingyinNormal.zh: 加塞利老师，我有点恶心。请问我可以坐到前面去吗？可以，佩德罗，你可以去火车的前面。

yingyinNormal.en: Madam Gazelle. I feel a bit sick, can I go to the front, please? Okay, Pedro, you can go to the front of the train.
yingyinNormal.zh: 羚羊夫人，我感觉有点不舒服，我可以坐到前面去吗？好的，佩德罗，那么你就做到前面去吧。

yingyinNormal.en: You want to sit front or back? I'll sit over there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你想坐前面还是后面？我就坐那里吧。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.en: After dinner, me, her, and Pepper all fell asleep in front of the fire.
yingyinNormal.zh: 晚饭后，我们两个和辣椒，在炉火前面睡着了。

yingyinNormal.en: Bunking will be arranged with youngest at the front and veterans at the back.
yingyinNormal.zh: 床铺按照年龄顺序，年轻的在前面，老兵在后面。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, but no backside. And a front side that shouldn't be allowed outside.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是啊，但没有后面[屁股] ，而"前面"根本不能掏出外面见人。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, darlings. If everyone will focus their attention to the front of the room, war.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，亲爱的。请大家把注意力集中到教室前面的黑板上，战争。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, who you gonna hit on? The girl in front of us got strawberry. That's your favorite.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你准备搭讪哪个？排我们前面的那个姑娘买了草莓味，你的最爱。

yingyinNormal.en: It's the equivalent of crashing at 94 miles per hour into a wall with a door in front of it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这相当于以94英里每小时的速度顶着它前面的一扇门撞进墙里。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay? Yeah, it's a perfectly good word. I mean, you put it in front of dokay And you really got something.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还行？这个词很好啊，放在“不错”前面，效果也很好啊。

yingyinNormal.en: You want to take the front of the ship off? Sure. The nose airlock alone is 400 kg.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你想把整个飞行器的前面都拆了？没错，顶部的气密舱有400公斤重呢。

yingyinNormal.en: Or'd got hit in the back. It blew most of his guts and intestines out his front off for everywhere.
yingyinNormal.zh: 若是击中背部，把他的大部分内脏跟肠子从前面炸出落得到处都是。

yingyinNormal.en: I just hope that when Hal get shot it's through the front of his jacket. Like a simple entry wound not what you miss.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只希望哈尔中枪时，是穿过夹克前面。像个简单射伤，不足为虑。

yingyinNormal.en: It's pickup day. The cans are in front. I know. You need some help? No. Maybe I'll do it later.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天是垃圾回收日，垃圾车就在前面。我知道，要我帮忙吗? 不用了，我还是过会儿再去吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Fine? You said it was fine? Yeah, it's a perfectly good word. You put it in front of wine or dining, and you've really got something.
yingyinNormal.zh: 挺好？你说挺好？这个词很好啊，放在“酒”和“餐”前面，效果不是很好嘛。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, first question. Ah, right up front. Hi. Hi. Hi, I'm Alex. Long-time reader, first-time grabber.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，第一个问题。前面这位。你好。你好。你好，我是艾丽克斯。长期粉丝，但第一次抓住机会。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, kids. Come here. Do you see anything right here? Yeah. It looks like a boat. A boat. Yeah. Right in front of the Statue of Liberty.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嗨，小子。到这里来，你在这里看到什么了吗？看起来像一只船。一只船。正好在自由女神前面。

yingyinNormal.en: You see the disk in front and then when it goes around you see the disk wrap up around the top of the black hole and wrap around the bottom of the black hole.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你看到前面的吸积盘，然后当它绕着，你会看到吸积盘绕着黑洞顶部包裹，然后绕着黑洞底部弯曲。

yingyinNormal.en: What's that? It's our bicycle. I sit at the front and Mummy pig sit at the back. And we can put these two seats on the back for Peppa and George.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是什么？这是我们的自行车。我坐在前面，猪妈妈就坐在我后面。我们还能把这两个位置放在后面给佩奇和乔治坐。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 最前线；最重要的位置

word_family.mean: n. 前部；前面；正面；最前面部分；前线；前沿阵地；模样；举止；胆大；自信；脸；前额

examination_example.sentence: The home <highlight>front</highlight> differs from the workplace in that division of labor at home is seldom clear-cut.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 家庭方面与工作场所的不同之处在于，家庭中的分工很少是明确的。

examination_example.sentence: On the home <highlight>front</highlight>, however, people have no such clarity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在家庭方面，人们就没有这么清楚明确了。

examination_example.sentence: The home <highlight>front</highlight> lags well behind the workplace in making adjustments for working women.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在为职业女性作出调整方面，家庭方面远远落后于工作场所。

examination_example.sentence: The majority of which show sitters posing miserably and stiffly in <highlight>front</highlight> of painted backdrops, or staring absently into the middle distance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其中大部分展示了画面中的人在画中的背景前痛苦而僵硬地摆着姿势，或者心不在焉地盯着中间向远处望去。

sense_info_list.en: to lead an organization or group of musicians

word_usage.usage: front作名词时，常用单数形式，且常与定冠词the连用，如：the front of the building

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 前面的；正面的；从正面发起的；前额的；头盖骨前部的

word_family.mean: n. 前部；前面；正面；最前面部分；前线；前沿阵地；模样；举止；胆大；自信；脸；前额

examination_example.sentence: But a minute in <highlight>front</highlight> of a painting in a hurried crowd won't do that.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是在匆忙的人群中，在一幅画前呆上一分钟是做不到这一点的。

examination_example.sentence: If I were to discover a newborn at my <highlight>front</highlight> door, it wouldn't be my fault, but it most certainly would be my responsibility.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我在前门发现一个新生儿，这不是我的错，但这肯定是我的责任。

examination_example.sentence: Remember how you feel when you're speeding down the highway and a big truck suddenly brakes twenty meters in <highlight>front</highlight> of you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 还记得当你在高速公路上超速行驶，一辆大卡车突然在你面前二十米处刹车时你的感受吗？

examination_example.sentence: As the ocean warms, a body of water called the Antarctic Polar <highlight>Front</highlight> is being pushed further south.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着海洋变暖，被称为南极锋的水体被进一步推向南方。

examination_example.sentence: They feed primarily on only a few kinds of krill in the Antarctic Polar <highlight>Front</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们主要以南极锋前沿的几种磷虾为食。

sense_info_list.en: an area of activity or interest

examination_example.sentence: Any crack in that <highlight>front</highlight> could be fatal for tech companies that must operate worldwide.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于必须在全球范围内运营的科技公司来说，这方面的任何漏洞都可能是致命的。

examination_example.sentence: EPIC <highlight>fronted</highlight> the money for the purchase of $2.5 million worth of young bison that will be raised according to its grass-fed protocols.
examination_example.sentence_trans: EPIC 预付资金购买了价值250万美元的幼野牛，这些幼野牛将按照草饲协议饲养。

word_usage.usage: front作形容词，没有比较级和最高级形式。

当表示在具体的地点前面时，一般不用before，而往往用in front of。
There is a truck parked in front of my gate.
有一辆卡车停在我家门前。

in front of、in the front of都可译为“在…的前面”，区别是：
in front of主要指在某物体外面的前面；而in the front of则指在某物体内部的前面。示例：
He's sitting in front of the car.
 他坐在车子的前面。(人在车外)
He's sitting in the front of the car.
他坐在车子的前面。 (人在车里)

由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

adj. 前面的；正面的；从正面发起的；前额的；头盖骨前部的

word_family.mean: n. 前部；前面；正面；最前面部分；前线；前沿阵地；模样；举止；胆大；自信；脸；前额

examination_example.sentence: Following this, students had to complete a difficult mental math task in <highlight>front</highlight> of the same upper-year students.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 接下来，学生们必须在同样的高年级学生面前完成一项困难的数学脑力任务。

examination_example.sentence: Another playtime thief: the growing proportion of kids' time spent in <highlight>front</highlight> of screens and digital devices, even among preschoolers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一个游戏时间窃贼：孩子们花在屏幕和数字设备前的时间越来越多，甚至学龄前儿童也是如此。

examination_example.sentence: That is, generally, younger people tend to outnumber older people on the <highlight>front</highlight> end of a technological shift.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也就是说，一般来说，在技术变革的前沿，年轻人往往比老年人多。

word_usage.usage: front作形容词，没有比较级和最高级形式。

in front of、in the front of都可译为“在…的前面”，区别是：
in front of主要指在某物体外面的前面；而in the front of则指在某物体内部的前面。示例：
He's sitting in front of the car.
 他坐在车子的前面。(人在车外)
He's sitting in the front of the car.
他坐在车子的前面。 (人在车里)

当表示在具体的地点前面时，一般不用before，而往往用in front of。
There is a truck parked in front of my gate.
有一辆卡车停在我家门前。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: They stay in <highlight>front</highlight> of screens for too long.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们在屏幕前待的时间太长了。

examination_example.sentence: Suddenly a football fell just in <highlight>front</highlight> of me and almost hit me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 突然一个足球正好落在我面前，差点砸到我。

examination_example.sentence: I was afraid to speak in <highlight>front</highlight> of a large group of people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我不敢在一大群人面前讲话。

direction_info.description:

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 在前面；在靠前的位置；在前部；在前面；在正面；处于领先位置

examination_example.sentence: Mike and Peter are standing in <highlight>front</highlight> of her.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 迈克和彼得站在她面前。

examination_example.sentence: I sat in the <highlight>front</highlight>, took notes and even recorded every single word he said in class, but nothing helped.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我坐在前面，做笔记，甚至记录他在课堂上说的每一个字，但没有任何帮助。

examination_example.sentence: Sitting in <highlight>front</highlight> of the screen for too long is unhealthy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 长时间坐在屏幕前是不健康的。

word_usage.usage: front作形容词，没有比较级和最高级形式。

当表示在具体的地点前面时，一般不用before，而往往用in front of。
There is a truck parked in front of my gate.
有一辆卡车停在我家门前。

in front of、in the front of都可译为“在…的前面”，区别是：
in front of主要指在某物体外面的前面；而in the front of则指在某物体内部的前面。示例：
He's sitting in front of the car.
 他坐在车子的前面。(人在车外)
He's sitting in the front of the car.
他坐在车子的前面。 (人在车里)

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation:
在某范围内的前面。
例：The driver sat in the front of the car.
司机坐在汽车的前面。

在某范围外的前面。
例：The policeman stood in front of the car.
警察站在汽车前面。
